snippet.title: Cthulhu Mythos ADV The Isle Of Ubohoth_Long PV_English Ver.
snippet.description:
Steam and iOS version is available NOW!!

A horror dice roll adventure inspired by the Cthulhu Mythos. Much like in a tabletop RPG, "abilities," "luck," and "dice rolls" influence the story's progression. The protagonist is cursed on an island in the Seto Inland Sea. Investigate the island, uncover the mysteries, and break the curse!

■Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2701590
■iOS：https://apps.apple.com/us/app/the-isle-of-ubohoth/id6474416069
